mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APRV_DOCUMENT A JOIN SECURITY_DOC B ON A.DOC_NO = B.DOC_NO WHERE B.SCRTY_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT A.DOC_NO, C.DOC_FORM, A.DOC_TITLE, D.EMP_NAME, A.DFT_DATE, B.SCRTY_REQ_DATE FROM APRV_DOCUMENT A JOIN SECURITY_DOC B ON A.DOC_NO = B.DOC_NO JOIN DOCUMENT_TYPE C ON A.DOC_TYPE = C.DOC_TYPE_NO JOIN USER_INFO D ON A.DRAFTER = D.EMP_NO WHERE B.SCRTY_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY 6 DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APRV_DOCUMENT A JOIN SECURITY_DOC B ON A.DOC_NO = B.DOC_NO WHERE B.SCRTY_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT A.DOC_NO, C.DOC_FORM, A.DOC_TITLE, D.EMP_NAME, A.DFT_DATE, B.SCRTY_SET_DATE FROM APRV_DOCUMENT A JOIN SECURITY_DOC B ON A.DOC_NO = B.DOC_NO JOIN DOCUMENT_TYPE C ON A.DOC_TYPE = C.DOC_TYPE_NO JOIN USER_INFO D ON A.DRAFTER = D.EMP_NO WHERE B.SCRTY_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY 6 DESC
